00029 namespace vd = vle::devs;
00030 namespace vv = vle::value;
00031 namespace vu = vle::utils;
00032  
00033 namespace  Crop {
00034  
00035     class UnitConstruction : public vd::Executive
00036     {
00037     public:
00038         UnitConstruction(
00039             const vd::ExecutiveInit& model,
00040             const vd::InitEventList& events)
00041              : vd::Executive(model, events)
00042         {
00043             m_buffer = events.get("translate").clone();
00044         }
00045  
00046  
00047         virtual ~UnitConstruction() {}
00048  
00049  
00050         virtual vd::Time init(const vd::Time& /*time*/)
00051         {
00052             vle::translator::MatrixTranslator tr(*this);
00053             tr.translate(*m_buffer);
00054             delete m_buffer;
00055  
00056 //          coupledmodel().writeXML(std::cout); 
00057  
00058             return vd::Time::infinity;
00059         }
00060  
00061  
00062     private:
00063         vv::Value* m_buffer;
00064     };
00065  
00066 }

00068 DECLARE_NAMED_EXECUTIVE(UnitConstruction, Crop::UnitConstruction);
